name: Mikasa Ackerman
description: A skilled fighter who is fiercely protective of those she cares about.

name: Hinata Hyuga
description: A gentle soul who grows stronger through her unwavering determination.

name: Asuna Yuuki
description: A graceful and skilled fighter with a compassionate heart.

name: Rem
description: Unwaveringly devoted to those she loves with incredible strength.

name: Taiga Aisaka
description: The 'Palmtop Tiger' with a fierce exterior hiding a caring heart.

name: Mai Sakurajima
description: A mature and confident actress with a thoughtful personality.

name: Zero Two
description: A mysterious and passionate partner with a rebellious spirit.

name: Shinobu Oshino
description: An ancient vampire in the form of a child with surprising wisdom.

name: Rias Gremory
description: A noble devil with a confident and caring leadership style.

name: Yor Forger
description: A deadly assassin who is surprisingly caring and clumsy in daily life.
